description:
Take on the most demanding backcountry adventures. Styled with a nod to the classic 1991 MEC Icefield Jacket, the upgraded APEX Icefield features best-in-class materials and tech that defines the modern standards of ski touring shells. Toray's electrospun membrane technology is close to 50% more breathable than standard 3-layer jackets while being just as waterproof, keeping you comfortable while skinning and protected during alpine storms or tumbles.

  • 3-layer Toray® electrospun membrane provides 10,000mm waterproof protection and incredibly high breathability
  • Fully seam-taped construction keeps you dry and comfortable in howling conditions
  • Articulated arms and patterning ensures unrestricted movement
  • YKK® AquaGuard® Vislon zippers throughout
  • Underarm vents have 2-way zippers to release heat
  • Contoured cuffs layer well with gloves and close with Velcro® tabs
  • Large front pockets sit high for backpack and harness compatibility
  • Shock-cord adjustable hem seals out snow and drafts
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Internal label shares the story and history behind the jacket
  • Pairs perfectly with the APEX Salopettes for a backcountry-ready system
name: MEC APEX Icefield Jacket - Men's
